Albuquerque.Marble Brewery (Albuquerque, New Mexico): Marble Brewery is a brewery in Albuquerque, New Mexico, founded in 2008. As of 2014, it was the second largest brewery in New Mexico behind Santa Fe Brewing Company with an annual production volume of 13,000 US barrels. In 2016, the brewery completed a major expansion which increased the production capacity to 30,000 barrels.
